The USDA plans to open new lands for ranching to ease supply constraints and boost processing capacity, with the goal of making meat and poultry more affordable for consumers. Rollins also initiated a public-private partnership to reduce wildfire risk by creating strategic fuel breaks across both public and private lands. Additionally, the Secretary announced a plan to bolster meat and poultry safety, aiming to provide American consumers with the safest and most abundant food supply in the world.
